row.entry: An INTEGER2 year value in the range 0 to 9999.
An UNSIGNED1 month value in the range 1 to 12.
An UNSIGNED1 day value in the range 1 to 31.

sect1.para: The FromGregorianYMD function returns a Days_t value from the year, month, and day parameters representing the number days since 31st December 1BC in the Gregorian calendar (see The Calendar FAQ by Claus Tondering at http://www.tondering.dk/claus/calendar.html).
